title: Bug 103963 - No friendly error message displayed when there is no data for series
OB: When there is no data for a series in the chart, no error message is displayed to the user.
EB: When there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a chart.
2. Set the data definition.
3. Select a column without any data.
